title: Gorgeous
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:00.39] Gorgeous
[00:03.35] 
[00:07.26] You should take it as a compliment
[00:09.18] That I got drunk and made fun of the way you talk
[00:14.93] 
[00:17.37] You should think about the consequence
[00:19.52] Of your magnetic field being a little too strong
[00:24.96] 
[00:27.12] And I got a boyfriend, he's older than us
[00:30.27] He's in the club doin' I don't know what
[00:32.86] You're so cool, it makes me hate you so much
[00:35.44] (I hate you so much)
[00:36.67] Whisky on ice, Sunset and Vine
[00:41.91] You've ruined my life, by not being mine
[00:49.26] You're so gorgeous
[00:51.58] I can't say anything to your face
[00:55.46] 'Cause look at your face
[00:59.55] And I'm so furious
[01:02.03] At you for making me feel this way
[01:06.04] But what can I say?
[01:07.80] You're gorgeous
[01:12.38] You should take it as a compliment
[01:14.34] That I'm talking to everyone here but you
[01:18.00] (But you, but you)
[01:21.83] And you should think about the consequence
[01:24.88] Of you touching my hand in the darkened room
[01:28.31] (Dark room, dark room)
[01:32.36] If you've got a girlfriend, I'm jealous of her
[01:35.25] But if you're single, that's honestly worse
[01:37.76] 'Cause you're so gorgeous it actually hurts (Honey, it hurts)
[01:41.82] Ocean blue eyes, lookin' in mine
[01:46.55] I feel like I might sink and drown and die
[01:53.83] You're so gorgeous
[01:56.42] I can't say anything to your face
[02:00.44] 'Cause look at your face
[02:04.20] And I'm so furious
[02:07.20] At you for making me feel this way
[02:11.31] But what can I say?
[02:12.92] You're gorgeous
[02:14.53] You make me so happy, it turns back to sad
[02:17.29] There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have
[02:19.89] You are so gorgeous, it makes me so mad
[02:25.18] You make me so happy, it turns back to sad
[02:27.75] There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have
[02:30.41] Guess I'll just stumble on home to my cats
[02:35.43] Alone
[02:38.14] Unless you wanna come along?
[02:41.26] You're so gorgeous
[02:43.99] I can't say anything to your face (To your face)
[02:47.88] 'Cause look at your face (At your face)
[02:51.50] And I'm so furious (I'm so furious)
[02:54.49] At you for making me feel this way (Feel this way)
[02:58.16] But what can I say? (I say)
[02:59.94] You're gorgeous
[03:01.69] You make me so happy, it turns back to sad
[03:04.19] There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have
[03:06.73] You are so gorgeous, it makes me so mad
[03:10.40] You're gorgeous
[03:12.16] You make me so happy, it turns back to sad
[03:14.59] There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have
[03:17.07] You are so gorgeous, it makes me so mad
[03:20.49] You're gorgeous
[03:22.08]
